p: Carvacrol was biosynthesized consistently in high amounts from March to October (84.2% in Qartaba and 80.2% in Aabadiye for lyophilized samples, and 80.5% in Qartaba and 80.7% in Aabadiye for air-dried samples) ( Tables S2 and S3). Its relative proportion was lower in the cold season from November to February, when metabolism slows down.
